headline: CEO & Co-Founder @ Ajourney | Consolidate & automate your payroll
summary:
CEO, co-founder of Ajourney and previously CTO, co-founder of honestbee

Ajourney is a modern payroll solution that helps local and regional businesses simplify their payroll by consolidating and automating all their payrolls in one place. We provide payroll support so that businesses can run their businesses and payrolls compliantly without requiring internal payroll expertise.

experiences.title: CEO & Co-Founder
experiences.description: Ajourney is a modern payroll solution that helps local and regional businesses simplify their payroll by consolidating and automating all their payrolls in one place. We provide payroll support so that businesses can run their businesses and payrolls compliantly without requiring internal payroll expertise.

experiences.title: Head of Product Development - OBFS and Loyalty Tech
experiences.description: Building product and enabling transformation in FairPrice Group

experiences.title: Co Founder | VP (Engineering)
experiences.description:
• Grew and managed a 130+ sized product & engineering organisation across 4 hubs – Singapore (50+), Taipei (60+), Bangalore (20+), Ho Chi Minh (5+)
• Developed job levels and compensation banding for individual contributors and managers across engineering, data, product management and project roles across all hubs
• Managed a wide variety of functions in terms of strategy and roadmap – Product Engineering, DevOps, Data Science, Data Engineering, Business Intelligence
• Develop a strong engineering culture of trust, quality and ownership with emphasis on teams, not individuals
• Drive decisions on technology choices such as Build vs Buy and technology stacks
• Dive deep and be hands-on when necessary to get ground context in the business, operations and tech to facilitate higher level decision making
• Oversee logistics and eCommerce product development for 8 geographies – SG, HK, TW, MY, PH, TH, ID, JP
• Manage stakeholders to crystallise business needs and perform product roadmap prioritisation
• Led product and engineering development for habitat by honestbee, a Food and Groceries O2O retail store
• Handle incoming product and technology due diligence for fund raising
• PR trained and served as the spokesperson for English and Chinese media and events
• honestbee tech stack: AWS, Kubernetes, DataDog (Monitoring), Drone CI, Postgres, Redis, ElasticSearch, RoR, Golang, Python (Data), Airflow, Redshift, Looker (BI), Node/React, React Native, iOS, Android, Git

experiences.title: Lead Software Engineer
experiences.description:
• Development and code reviews for for consumer web (Node.js, rendr.js) and backend (Ruby on Rails)
• Set up CI/CD (AWS, Travis CI) and BI Tools (Periscope)

experiences.title: Lead Software Engineer
experiences.description: • Led the MVP development of a headhunting network in Ruby on Rails

experiences.company: NUS Computing for Voluntary Welfare Organisations
experiences.title: Team Lead
experiences.description:
•	Led a team of developers to develop, enhance and deploy systems for 5 different Voluntary Welfare Organisations (VWO) with PHP and Drupal 7.
•	Carried out requirement studies for the systems involved.
•	Managed clients’ requirements and expectations realistically to prevent feature creep and ensure timely deployment.

experiences.company: NUS Computing for Voluntary Welfare Organisations
experiences.title: Summer Fellow
experiences.description:
Worked in a team that was involved in building a Client Management System for Movement for the Intellectually Disabled in Singapore (MINDS).

Developed the Attendance Taking and Attendance Reporting modules.

experiences.title: Software Engineer & Strategic Client Relations Manager
experiences.description:
• Developed a search engine using JavaScript, Node.JS, ElasticSearch to query a candidate database • Developed LinkedIn search SOPs and automated repetitive work via a Chrome Extension
• Self-trained as a recruitment consultant specialising in technical recruitment
• Generated revenue from recruitment that moved the company into the black in 2014 Q1

experiences.title: Operations Analyst
experiences.description:
•	Managed language localisation for Zong's products across 30+ countries worldwide. Streamlined the localisation workflow from the start (communicating with vendors) to the end (deployment) to ensure quick response time while maintaining low costs. Wait time for translations from vendors was shortened from 2 weeks to 3 days.
•	Developed a Flash demo game implementing one of Zong’s newest product – a headless mobile API payments solution. Demo game was used as a showcase in presentations for clients and conventions.
•	Assisted product team to gather analytics data and carry out testing of product payments flow across multiple countries using DeviceAnywhere.
experiences.location: Menlo Park, San Francisco Bay Area

accomplishment_projects.title: Tenza Yakitori
accomplishment_projects.description: iPad app consisting of an integrated game and restaurant menu developed for Tenza Izakaya restaurant. Customers of the restaurant can play the game and exchange for rewards on-the-spot.
